TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Guinea-Bissau, title = Guinea-Bissau, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Guinea-Bissau} }

S.FORM: = Guinea-Bissau = Gaga kska Meycow ka Guinea-bissau, 12 00 N, 15 00 W ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 36,125 sq km(hangan na o Tg138)(knlbanga dxgal o 28,120 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 8,005 sq km). Kana ka sejiqun o niqan 1,759,159 hiyi. Gaga Bissau ka pusu alang paru, jiyax 24 idas 9 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Manu ka dxgal Guinea-bissau ga wada sugan 44.80% ka dxgal qpahan, 55.20% ka dxgal bbuyu, rahuq dxgal do niqan 0% na. Bukung klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka José Mário Vaz, pnaah hngkawas2014 idas 6 jiyax 23pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' = Cineyyapisor = Cineyyapisor-kunghekwo (Kari Putawya: República da Guiné-Bissau), sun dha Cineyyapisor shaya(Kari Putawya::Guiné-Bissau), kika mniq klwaan gqiyan hidaw,Pusucineyya ka sexual. Daya Cineyyapisor o Sayneyciyaer, hraan hidaw, hunac o Cineyya kiya, gqiyan hidaw o paru gsilung Tasiyang. Kana sejiqun dha o 1,600,000 seejiq,pusu bi paru alang o Pisor. Cineyyapisor o kika mniq kana klwaan o tgkingal bukuy bi knmalu ka klwaan knmrigan dxgal dha. Ris Seejiq Putawya mniq saw 1446 hngkwasan siiga, Cineyyapisor nii o sun dha Pusucineyya,kiya ka kiya ni saw bi mniq 1600 kngkwasan, seejiq Putawya pnhyugan cikuh Mawyicang dha. Seejiq Putawya kndadax nniqan Cineyyapisor mapa qmpah seejiq dhuq Weyteciyaw. Siida, seejiq Putawya o rnngagun dhiya nanaq o gaga kmlawa kana Cineyyapisor, kiya ka kiya ni ungac saw kiya biyax kmlawa ka seejiq Putawya. 19 sci, dhuq saw ini hari knmalu ka Mawyi qmpah seejiq do, kika miyah mrmuxan miing kmalu dxgal ka sejiqun Putawya. Kmlawa ka seejiq Putawya o tnhuway balay ni egu bi seejiq miyah smiyuk. Uxay uri o seasug egu bi dxgal biqun dha Sifey ka seejiq Putawya, kana o niqan ka yayung Kasamangshe. Seuxal han o Putawya sun dha "Bolama" kika mrmuxan Cineyya ni smiyuk bi balay ka ndhiya, kiya do mnuda mdudul Alimika Yowrisis.Kerante mniq 1870 hngkwasan ka mrmux ruwan da,bukuy bi do tduwa mrmux ruwan ka Pusucineyya. 1879 hngkwasan,kndadax Pusuweyteciyaw qduriq ka Pusucineyya da. 1915 hngkwasan mnhtu Cminyuntung ka Putawya. Kiya ka kiya ni niqan cikuh tnciyan na, dhuq saw 1936 hngkwasan do kika tduwa bi mnhtdu da. 1941 hngkwasan pusu paru alang o kndadax Porama thjilan dhuq Pisor. 1952 hngkwasan pnryuhan ka Siyeynfa do, kika pnryuhan hangan "Putawya-hayway-lingti葡萄牙海外領地" ka Pusucineyya-Cminti. 1956 hngkwasan nburux pnhiyug ka Cineyya ni Weytecyaw-dang. Kndadax saw 1961 hngkwasan pnhiyug ka Cineyya ni Weytecyaw-dang do, kika prajing smiyuk Putawya,yasa egu bi ka Cunjn ka Putawya hmrinas 3 Wan 5000 seejiq, knteetu mllabang ka biyax dha. 1968 hngkwasan Cineyya ni Weytecyaw-dang kika tduwa bi ngalun dha ka nniqan Cineyya-Pisor.24 jiyax 9 idas 1973 hngkwasan tduwa emburux ka Cineyya-Pisor. Mtna hngkwasan 11 idas siida, Leynhkwo-tahwey kana pntaqun dha gipu o 93:7, kika smruwa kana knlangan ni tuwa emburux ka Cineyya-Pisor da. 1980 hngkwasan siida, cungli Nuoan-peyernatuo-weyayra ddulun Cng-pyeyn pnryuhun Seyhu dha. 11 ida 1981 hngkwasan dhuq 5 idas 1984 hngkwasan cyuanri dha o gaga ngalan mdudul Weyayra keming-weyyuanhwey seejiq nii da. 1984 hngkwasan kwohwey dandangc o snruwa pnryuhun bgurah siyenfa, kika niqan ka bgurah mdudul dha uri. Mniq druma cdu dha o,mdudul klwaan dha ni yuansor klwaan ni cngfu-sornaw,kana nii o kika Cineyya ni Weytecyaw-dang ni cyunfang-sorring.1983 hngkwasan, 1985 hngkwasan saw bi niqan bi lnglungan musa smiyuk gaga kmlawa Weyayra cngfu nii. 1994 hngkwasan tgkingal Sankio klwaan mdudul ni Kwohwey. 1998 hngkwasan o Neycang Cyuns. 1999 hngkwsan o klwaan mdudul dha o qduriq da.2000 hngkwasan o kndadax Sankiyo,mdudul dha o Kumba Ialá Cngc Cngc Cineyyapisor o ini angal kana biyax kmlawa ka mdudul dha ni tayyi-cngc, twotangc-kuoghec. Cuongtuong o kingal mdudal klwaan, Cuongri o tgdha biyax na ka mniq kinal klwaan ka hiya. Kmlawa singcngcyuan ka cgnfu. Cngfu ni kwohwey o supu kmlawa Rifacyuan. Sfa Cineyyapisor o murux ka Singcng ni Rifa dha.Cineyyapisor pnhiyug snkingal yaunc kwohwey ka klwaan nii (Cineyyapisor-cyuankwo-jnming-yihwey, Assembleia Nacional Popular da Guiné-Bissau ) , kika yiyuanc ka nii. Mniq 28 jiyax 3 idas 2004 hngkwasan do kndadax Sankiyo kika prajing. Kana tleengan ruwan o 102, kana tleengan nii o kndadax Sankiyo kana ka 100,sngari 2 tleengan nii o biqun dha gaga eseisil alang sejiqan Cineyyapisor kiya, kiya ka kiya ni Sankiyo sexual o ida mniq hiya ka sngari 2 tleengan na. Kana qmpah Yiyuan dha o 4 hngkwasan. Ungac ka snkingal mangal kana biyax ka cngtang kiya, ryenhecgnfu kana.Kndadax Sankiyo ka kmlawa mdudul dha, kana qmpah mdudul dha o 5 hngkwasan.Kndadax Kaygi kwohwey o, mdudul dha o mlawa Cuongri miyah qmpah kiya. Singcng-cyuhwa Niqan mspac Cyu(regiões) ka Cineyyapisor ni kingal ka Ccsiyen(sector autónomo),druma Cyu o phiyug Siyen(sectores). Kana Cyu o niqan: Tiri Gaga mniq gqian hidaw Feyco ka Cineyyapisor, niqan Pijerkes-cyundaw(Bijagos Archipelago)dnii, gaga gqiyan hidaw ssiyaw Tasiyang, mniq ssiyaw daya Neyciyaer,hraan hidaw, hunac ssiyaw Cineyya, kana dxgal dha o 36,120 km2, kana bbaraw leelug ssiyaw gsilung o 350km, tgkingal bbaraw bi dgiyaq o 300cm, ruwan dxgal gqian hidaw muxul bi karac Cawyuan , pusu bi hnigan dxgal klwaan dha o breenux.Karac Cineyyapisor o quri saw muxul hari kiya, egu bi jiyax o mtalux balay ka karac na.6 idas dhuq 11 idas o prajing egu jiyax qnyuxan ni qmraq gqian hidaw hunac bghur. 12 idas dhuq 5 idas o ungac bi qnyuxan, qmraq hraan hidaw Hamatan bgihur. Cingci Cineyyapisor o kika empusal ungac bi pila klwaan ka hiya. Klwaan Cingci dha o pusu bi emptdxgal ni emptqsurux. Kiya ka kiya ni mniq saw 1998 hngkwasan, Cingci ni pnhyugan dha klwaan o psnaqah Neycang dha nanaq. Sejiqun Dhuq 3 idas 2009 hngkwasan, kana sejiqan Cineyyapisor o 1,548,159, 99% seejiq klwaan dha o seejiq mqalux kana, binaw niqan mtru klgan, niqan ka supu mniq daya ni hraan hidaw daya seejiq Fula ni Mandinka, nniqan ssiyaw silung hunac seejiq o Balanta ni Papel, nniqan ska ni ssiyaw silung daya o Manjaco ni Mancanha. Sngri o seejiq Muratuo(Mrmuxan seejiq mqalux ni seejiq Putawya). Balay bi seejiq Putawya o ciway bi kiya, yasa murux ka Cineyyapisor do egu bi seejiq Putawya musa mrmux dxgal Cineyyapisor da. Seejiq Cineyyapisor nii o mrana 2.07%. Mtucing laqi rabu o egu balay, kana ruwan 1000 seejiq o kika niqan 49.92 laqi rabu, kingal uwa o musa tucing 7.56 laqi rabu. Kiya ka kiya ni mhuqil ka laqi rabu dha o egu balay, kana 1000 seejiq o 16.53 seejiq musa mhuqil.Dsnaw hngkwasan o 45.05, dqrijil hngkwasan o 48.75 kiya.44% seejiq gaga djiyun kari Kriol, yasa kari Putawya ka lmglug ka Keriaweryu nii. Wana 14% seejiq ka gaga djiyun pusu bi kari dha kari Putawya .Sngri o djiyun kari Feyco.Niqan 50% sejiqan snhian Cwantuong-Cuongcyaw. Kana snhian Isranjyaw seejiq o 45%,pusu gaga djiyun seejiq o Fula ni Mandinka.5% sejiqan o snhian pnrhuran joro, knegu seejiq o snhian Tyencujyaw. Kndsan Radio Cineyyapisor o pusu bi gunbe kana. Gunbe o kika Skrayan Cineyyapisor, kiya ka kiya ni lmglug bi ka Cngc klwaan, kika Radio Gunbe dha o ini bi knegu seejiq kuxul qnbahang da.Huru nii o kika pusu djiyun dha Radio, djiyan dha mniq saw mriqu bi Rodio. Pusu djiyun kari Seejiq Cineyyapisor o Crioulo(Cineyyapisor Keriaweryu ).Gunbe o supu kana ana manu Radio Cineyyapisor, kiya ka kiya ni muxan maxal Radio klwaan dha. Tina ni Tinga ka pusu bi Radio dha uri. Tgsaan Dhuq 2003 hngkwasan, kana kla qmita ji o 42.4%, dsnaw o 58.1%, duwa o 27.4%,qtaun ta hini o mrabang egu ka dsnaw dha. Waycyaw Cineyyapisor o 15 jiyax 3 idas 1974 hngkwasan mntna Cuonghwa-jnming-kuonghekwo Cyencyaw. 26 jiyax 5 ida 1990 hngkwasan, yasa 64djiyan Cineyyapisor o miyah sdarih Cuonghwa-mingkwo ka dhyaan, 31 jiyax 5 idas do tduwa laxan Cuonghwa-jnming-kuonghekwo da, dhuq 23 jiyax 4 idas 1998 hngkwasan do musa sqapah Cuonghwa-jnming-kuonghekwo duri, 24 jiyax 4 idas, Cuonghwa-mingkwo o tduwa ini supu dhyaan da. Pnyahan pnatas CIA 外交部

= Goinea-Bissao = Gaga kska Meycow ka Goinea-bissao, 12 00 N, 15 00 W ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 36,125 sq km(hangan na o Tg138)(knlbanga dxgal o 28,120 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 8,005 sq km). Kana ka sejiqon o niqan 1,759,159 hiyi. Gaga Bissao ka poso alang paro, jiyax 24 idas 9 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Mano ka dxgal Goinea-bissao ga wada sogan 44.80% ka dxgal qpahan, 55.20% ka dxgal bboyo, rahoq dxgal do niqan 0% na. Bokong klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka José Mário Vaz, pnaah hngkawas2014 idas 6 jiyax 23pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' = Cineyyapisor = Cineyyapisor-konghekwo (Kari Potawya: República da Goiné-Bissao), son dha Cineyyapisor shaya(Kari Potawya::Goiné-Bissao), kika mniq klwaan gqiyan hidaw,Posocineyya ka sexoal. Daya Cineyyapisor o Sayneyciyaer, hraan hidaw, honac o Cineyya kiya, gqiyan hidaw o paro gsilong Tasiyang. Kana sejiqon dha o 1,600,000 seejiq,poso bi paro alang o Pisor. Cineyyapisor o kika mniq kana klwaan o tgkingal bokoy bi knmalo ka klwaan knmrigan dxgal dha. Ris Seejiq Potawya mniq saw 1446 hngkwasan siiga, Cineyyapisor nii o son dha Posocineyya,kiya ka kiya ni saw bi mniq 1600 kngkwasan, seejiq Potawya pnhyogan cikoh Mawyicang dha. Seejiq Potawya kndadax nniqan Cineyyapisor mapa qmpah seejiq dhoq Weyteciyaw. Siida, seejiq Potawya o rnngagon dhiya nanaq o gaga kmlawa kana Cineyyapisor, kiya ka kiya ni ongac saw kiya biyax kmlawa ka seejiq Potawya. 19 sci, dhoq saw ini hari knmalo ka Mawyi qmpah seejiq do, kika miyah mrmoxan miing kmalo dxgal ka sejiqon Potawya. Kmlawa ka seejiq Potawya o tnhoway balay ni ego bi seejiq miyah smiyok. Uxay ori o seasog ego bi dxgal biqon dha Sifey ka seejiq Potawya, kana o niqan ka yayong Kasamangshe. Seoxal han o Potawya son dha "Bolama" kika mrmoxan Cineyya ni smiyok bi balay ka ndhiya, kiya do mnoda mdodol Alimika Yowrisis.Kerante mniq 1870 hngkwasan ka mrmox rowan da,bokoy bi do tdowa mrmox rowan ka Posocineyya. 1879 hngkwasan,kndadax Posoweyteciyaw qdoriq ka Posocineyya da. 1915 hngkwasan mnhto Cminyontong ka Potawya. Kiya ka kiya ni niqan cikoh tnciyan na, dhoq saw 1936 hngkwasan do kika tdowa bi mnhtdo da. 1941 hngkwasan poso paro alang o kndadax Porama thjilan dhoq Pisor. 1952 hngkwasan pnryohan ka Siyeynfa do, kika pnryohan hangan "Potawya-hayway-lingti葡萄牙海外領地" ka Posocineyya-Cminti. 1956 hngkwasan nborox pnhiyog ka Cineyya ni Weytecyaw-dang. Kndadax saw 1961 hngkwasan pnhiyog ka Cineyya ni Weytecyaw-dang do, kika prajing smiyok Potawya,yasa ego bi ka Conjn ka Potawya hmrinas 3 Wan 5000 seejiq, knteeto mllabang ka biyax dha. 1968 hngkwasan Cineyya ni Weytecyaw-dang kika tdowa bi ngalon dha ka nniqan Cineyya-Pisor.24 jiyax 9 idas 1973 hngkwasan tdowa emborox ka Cineyya-Pisor. Mtna hngkwasan 11 idas siida, Leynhkwo-tahwey kana pntaqon dha gipo o 93:7, kika smrowa kana knlangan ni towa emborox ka Cineyya-Pisor da. 1980 hngkwasan siida, congli Nooan-peyernatoo-weyayra ddolon Cng-pyeyn pnryohon Seyho dha. 11 ida 1981 hngkwasan dhoq 5 idas 1984 hngkwasan cyoanri dha o gaga ngalan mdodol Weyayra keming-weyyoanhwey seejiq nii da. 1984 hngkwasan kwohwey dandangc o snrowa pnryohon bgorah siyenfa, kika niqan ka bgorah mdodol dha ori. Mniq droma cdo dha o,mdodol klwaan dha ni yoansor klwaan ni cngfo-sornaw,kana nii o kika Cineyya ni Weytecyaw-dang ni cyonfang-sorring.1983 hngkwasan, 1985 hngkwasan saw bi niqan bi lnglongan mosa smiyok gaga kmlawa Weyayra cngfo nii. 1994 hngkwasan tgkingal Sankio klwaan mdodol ni Kwohwey. 1998 hngkwasan o Neycang Cyons. 1999 hngkwsan o klwaan mdodol dha o qdoriq da.2000 hngkwasan o kndadax Sankiyo,mdodol dha o Komba Ialá Cngc Cngc Cineyyapisor o ini angal kana biyax kmlawa ka mdodol dha ni tayyi-cngc, twotangc-kooghec. Coongtoong o kingal mdodal klwaan, Coongri o tgdha biyax na ka mniq kinal klwaan ka hiya. Kmlawa singcngcyoan ka cgnfo. Cngfo ni kwohwey o sopo kmlawa Rifacyoan. Sfa Cineyyapisor o morox ka Singcng ni Rifa dha.Cineyyapisor pnhiyog snkingal yaonc kwohwey ka klwaan nii (Cineyyapisor-cyoankwo-jnming-yihwey, Assembleia Nacional Popolar da Goiné-Bissao ) , kika yiyoanc ka nii. Mniq 28 jiyax 3 idas 2004 hngkwasan do kndadax Sankiyo kika prajing. Kana tleengan rowan o 102, kana tleengan nii o kndadax Sankiyo kana ka 100,sngari 2 tleengan nii o biqon dha gaga eseisil alang sejiqan Cineyyapisor kiya, kiya ka kiya ni Sankiyo sexoal o ida mniq hiya ka sngari 2 tleengan na. Kana qmpah Yiyoan dha o 4 hngkwasan. Ungac ka snkingal mangal kana biyax ka cngtang kiya, ryenhecgnfo kana.Kndadax Sankiyo ka kmlawa mdodol dha, kana qmpah mdodol dha o 5 hngkwasan.Kndadax Kaygi kwohwey o, mdodol dha o mlawa Coongri miyah qmpah kiya. Singcng-cyohwa Niqan mspac Cyo(regiões) ka Cineyyapisor ni kingal ka Ccsiyen(sector aotónomo),droma Cyo o phiyog Siyen(sectores). Kana Cyo o niqan: Tiri Gaga mniq gqian hidaw Feyco ka Cineyyapisor, niqan Pijerkes-cyondaw(Bijagos Archipelago)dnii, gaga gqiyan hidaw ssiyaw Tasiyang, mniq ssiyaw daya Neyciyaer,hraan hidaw, honac ssiyaw Cineyya, kana dxgal dha o 36,120 km2, kana bbaraw leelog ssiyaw gsilong o 350km, tgkingal bbaraw bi dgiyaq o 300cm, rowan dxgal gqian hidaw moxol bi karac Cawyoan , poso bi hnigan dxgal klwaan dha o breenox.Karac Cineyyapisor o qori saw moxol hari kiya, ego bi jiyax o mtalox balay ka karac na.6 idas dhoq 11 idas o prajing ego jiyax qnyoxan ni qmraq gqian hidaw honac bghor. 12 idas dhoq 5 idas o ongac bi qnyoxan, qmraq hraan hidaw Hamatan bgihor. Cingci Cineyyapisor o kika emposal ongac bi pila klwaan ka hiya. Klwaan Cingci dha o poso bi emptdxgal ni emptqsorox. Kiya ka kiya ni mniq saw 1998 hngkwasan, Cingci ni pnhyogan dha klwaan o psnaqah Neycang dha nanaq. Sejiqon Dhoq 3 idas 2009 hngkwasan, kana sejiqan Cineyyapisor o 1,548,159, 99% seejiq klwaan dha o seejiq mqalox kana, binaw niqan mtro klgan, niqan ka sopo mniq daya ni hraan hidaw daya seejiq Fola ni Mandinka, nniqan ssiyaw silong honac seejiq o Balanta ni Papel, nniqan ska ni ssiyaw silong daya o Manjaco ni Mancanha. Sngri o seejiq Moratoo(Mrmoxan seejiq mqalox ni seejiq Potawya). Balay bi seejiq Potawya o ciway bi kiya, yasa morox ka Cineyyapisor do ego bi seejiq Potawya mosa mrmox dxgal Cineyyapisor da. Seejiq Cineyyapisor nii o mrana 2.07%. Mtocing laqi rabo o ego balay, kana rowan 1000 seejiq o kika niqan 49.92 laqi rabo, kingal owa o mosa tocing 7.56 laqi rabo. Kiya ka kiya ni mhoqil ka laqi rabo dha o ego balay, kana 1000 seejiq o 16.53 seejiq mosa mhoqil.Dsnaw hngkwasan o 45.05, dqrijil hngkwasan o 48.75 kiya.44% seejiq gaga djiyon kari Kriol, yasa kari Potawya ka lmglog ka Keriaweryo nii. Wana 14% seejiq ka gaga djiyon poso bi kari dha kari Potawya .Sngri o djiyon kari Feyco.Niqan 50% sejiqan snhian Cwantoong-Coongcyaw. Kana snhian Isranjyaw seejiq o 45%,poso gaga djiyon seejiq o Fola ni Mandinka.5% sejiqan o snhian pnrhoran joro, knego seejiq o snhian Tyencojyaw. Kndsan Radio Cineyyapisor o poso bi gonbe kana. Gonbe o kika Skrayan Cineyyapisor, kiya ka kiya ni lmglog bi ka Cngc klwaan, kika Radio Gonbe dha o ini bi knego seejiq koxol qnbahang da.Horo nii o kika poso djiyon dha Radio, djiyan dha mniq saw mriqo bi Rodio. Poso djiyon kari Seejiq Cineyyapisor o Crioolo(Cineyyapisor Keriaweryo ).Gonbe o sopo kana ana mano Radio Cineyyapisor, kiya ka kiya ni moxan maxal Radio klwaan dha. Tina ni Tinga ka poso bi Radio dha ori. Tgsaan Dhoq 2003 hngkwasan, kana kla qmita ji o 42.4%, dsnaw o 58.1%, dowa o 27.4%,qtaon ta hini o mrabang ego ka dsnaw dha. Waycyaw Cineyyapisor o 15 jiyax 3 idas 1974 hngkwasan mntna Coonghwa-jnming-koonghekwo Cyencyaw. 26 jiyax 5 ida 1990 hngkwasan, yasa 64djiyan Cineyyapisor o miyah sdarih Coonghwa-mingkwo ka dhyaan, 31 jiyax 5 idas do tdowa laxan Coonghwa-jnming-koonghekwo da, dhoq 23 jiyax 4 idas 1998 hngkwasan do mosa sqapah Coonghwa-jnming-koonghekwo dori, 24 jiyax 4 idas, Coonghwa-mingkwo o tdowa ini sopo dhyaan da. Pnyahan pnatas CIA 外交部
